title: Beachfront, Full Villa in Kecamatan Kuta, Indonesia
description:
## About this space

Experience the ultimate Bali getaway in our stunning full villa! This spacious beachfront property accommodates up to 12 guests across 6 beautifully appointed bedrooms, each with its own private bathroom.

## The Villa

Our full villa combines all the best features of our individual rooms into one spectacular property. Perfect for large groups, families, or those seeking the ultimate privacy and luxury.

**Includes:**
- ✔ All 6 bedrooms (India Room, Nepal Room, Spa Room, Easy Room, and 2 additional rooms)
- ✔ 6 Private Bathrooms
- ✔ Exclusive use of entire property
- ✔ Private pool access
- ✔ Full kitchen access
- ✔ All living areas and common spaces
- ✔ Beautiful gardens and outdoor areas
- ✔ Dedicated staff for your stay

## Perfect for:
- Large family gatherings
- Group retreats
- Special celebrations
- Extended stays
- Complete privacy

The villa offers the perfect blend of Indonesian charm and modern luxury, with all the amenities you need for an unforgettable stay.
cancellationPolicy: Flexible cancellation up to 7 days before check-in for 50% refund. Cancel 14+ days before for full refund.
otherRules: Minimum 3-night stay required. Late check-in after 8 PM incurs additional fee of $50 USD. Please respect the property and local community.
